M10Robot:VeilStance.NAME: Veil
DESCRIPTION: Damage taken is halved. Exit this #yStance at the start of your next turn.

M10Robot:AbyssStance.NAME: Abyss
DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a card, draw #b1 card and apply #b1 #yDrench to a random enemy (once per turn per unique cost). NL At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock equal to the number of cards in your hand.

M10Robot:SmokeStance.NAME: Smoke
DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand at the end of your turn. NL Upon taking unblocked attack damage, discard your hand and reduce the damage taken by each card discarded this way.

M10Robot:HyperStance.NAME: Hyper
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose HP, lose #b2 less. At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yCharge if you did not lose HP last turn.

M10Robot:HugeStance.NAME: Giant
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal double damage. NL Lose [E] each time you play an attack.
